attributes.background: Everyday on social media more and more stories are being shown of young people bullied and they are either being seriously hurt or worse ending there own lives more needs to be done inside and outside the school gates to help lower or prevent this issue getting more worse then what it is

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to prevent bullying.
